isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - AERODYNAMIC PANELS - SLEEPER BOX AIR DEFLECTOR AND SIDE EXTENSIONS (93/9400) - INSTALL

svcproc.title: INSTALL
svcproc.para: Before installing air deflector and extension assembly, be sure to install sleeper box side fairing as shown in Figure 29.

step1.para: Position air deflector on roof of cab. Be sure mounting bracket is aligned to shield contour. Adjust with drift pin if required.
Insert bolts through deflector from outside inward with washers against both bolt head and nut. Loosely assemble all nuts.
On floor, position center extension between two side extensions and clamp into place. Allow an even 0.25 inch (6.35mm) gap between each side extension and the center extension.
Install the brace rod upper mounting bracket into the second and third holes from the rear of the side extensions. Install bolts from outside inward with washers against both nut and bolt head.
Place the two front (shortest) brace rods of the second hole from the front of the extension assembly. Install bolt, nut and washers.
Position the two rear (longest) brace rods to the brace rod upper mounting brackets. Install bolts, nuts and washers.
Install hose clamps at points where front brace rods intersect and where rear brace rods intersect ( Figure 30).

calloutgroup.callout1: 10.REAR (42 IN. BBC) OR INTERMEDIATE (60 IN. BBC) MOUNTING BRACKET

step1.para: Carefully lift extension subassembly to roof of sleeper box. Position sub- assembly so a gap of 2.0 inches (51mm) remains between the air deflector and extension assembly ( Figure 30 and Figure 31).
Install two bolts through the bottom flange at the rear of each side extension into rivnuts on top of sleeper box side fairings ( Figure 32and Figure 33).

calloutgroup.callout1: 4.LOCATION OF BOLTS AND NUTS TO MOUNT SIDE EXTENSIONS
1.5/16-18 X 1" BOLT, SPECIAL WASHER (2), 5/16" LOCK WASHER

step1.para: Insert 0.25 inch (6.35mm) spacers between the sleeper box roof and the bottom flanges of side extensions ( Figure 34).

calloutgroup.callout1: 5.3/8-16 X 1-1/4" BOLT, SPECIALWASHER (1-1/4" O.D.), 3/8" FLAT WASHER, 3/8" LOCKWASHER 3/8-16 NUT

step1.para: Loosen hose clamps at front brace rods in extension assembly. Position lower end of front brace rods to front mounting brackets. Install bolt, nut and washers ( Figure 35). Tighten hose clamps.

figure.caption: Figure 35. Install Bolts From Outside Inward

calloutgroup.callout1: 2.5/16"-18 X 1-1/4" BOLT, 5/16" FLAT WASHER, 5/16" EXTERNAL INTERNAL TOOTH LOCKWASHER (BETWEEN BRACKET AND BRACE ROD), 5/16" SPECIAL WASHER, 5/16" LOCKWASHER, 5/16"-18 NUT

step1.para: Loosen hose clamps at rear brace rods. Position lower ends of rear brace rods to rear mounting brackets. Install bolt, nut and washers as shown in Figure 34. Tighten hose clamps.

Insert four bolts and washers through each side extension into the sleeper box mounting brackets. Install bolts from outside inward with washers against both bolt head and nut ( Figure 35). Assemble all bolts loosely before tightening. Tighten all bolts alternately and evenly to prevent distortion of extension assembly.
Inspect air deflector/extension assembly to be sure that in all cases the proper washer is installed against both the bolt/screw head and the nut. Also verify that all fasteners have been tightened.
